fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Attack a player.
- Use the ability of a dead player at night, if it kills, you can't use another ability alongside this.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may multitask.
- If your kill fails by any means, you may pick a boost for your next attack:
• Powerful, if the target would die with a Basic attack anyways, it is rampaging instead.
• Astral and you appear as a role of your choice to investigations this night.
• Roleblocks target and roleblocks your non-attacking visitors.
